hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price remains within 5% of 50-day MA during NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent 5% breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound signals transition to BULL regime with 70% probability within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during neutral periods often precedes directional regime shifts. Breakouts with volume confirmation from compressed states have historically led to sustained moves. Current low-volatility environment (BTC RV ~35%) increases sensitivity to this signal.
entry_conditions: BTC closes > 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound (2 std dev)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% price appreciation from entry OR regime indicator confirms BULL (confidence > 75%)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of signals result in false breakouts (return to range within 3 days) OR less than 55% accuracy in regime transition prediction.
